name: SI Made & Product Not Shipped Greater Than 1 Day
query:
select si.name as "SI:Link/Sales Invoice:100",si.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:150",sii.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:450",dni.serial_no as "SerialNo::100",DATEDIFF(dn.creation,si.creation) as "No Of Days To Ship:Int:140" from `tabSales Invoice` si 
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` sii on sii.parent=si.name
inner join `tabDelivery Note Item` dni on dni.si_detail=sii.name
inner join `tabDelivery Note` dn on dni.parent=dn.name
where sii.item_group='Laptops' 
 and dni.docStatus=1 and dn.status='Completed' and dn.is_return<>1 and si.docStatus not in (0,2) and DATEDIFF(dn.creation,si.creation) > 1
report_name: SI Made & Product Not Shipped Greater Than 1 Day
